name: gynecologistsangeeta
description: Dr. Sangeeta Pradhan, gynecologist and obstetrician based in Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India.
author: Binay Pradhan

scripts.deploy: hugo --baseURL https://gynecologistsangeeta.com && wrangler pages deploy public --branch $(git branch --show-current)
scripts.deploy:preview: hugo --baseURL https://preview.gynecologistsangeeta-website.pages.dev/ && wrangler pages deploy public --branch preview
scripts.local: hugo --baseURL http://localhost:8880 && wrangler pages dev public
